purpose: Simplify the creation of full-stack, multichannel, trusted agents for Microsoft 365 and related platforms.
principle: Utilizes C# and the Microsoft Bot Framework to facilitate agent development across multiple channels.
reusability: Offers SDK and APIs for integration with Microsoft platforms, supports extensibility through plugins.
limitations: Primarily designed for Microsoft ecosystems, limited support for non-Microsoft platforms.
name: Agents
description: The Microsoft 365 Agent SDK simplifies building full stack, multichannel, trusted agents for platforms including M365, Teams, Copilot Studio, and Webchat.
highlight: Enables developers to build multichannel agents for Microsoft platforms like Teams and Copilot Studio.
